47144b41d76d.description: Worried that he had pissed away the best years of his professional life and never getting around to doing that web startup thing he pencilled in his Bucket List, Jon Yau spent $250,000 on a domain name, quit his job and now runs Stockphoto.com full time.

paragraphs.name: a633
paragraphs.text: Loved loved loved. Recently had a guy comment that if I raised money from female investors Silicon Valley would never take me seriously. And that was the nice thing he said. I’m a fan. Count me in your corner.
